page.title: 04HOME LIFE
page.content: Most people{(55%)}go out as a family regularly but many go alone sometimes. In{91%}of families there are 2 adults and most have 2 children.{Half}the families have 4 people in. Nearly all the people in this area do not have relatives living with them. Thus old people tend to live in homes or old peoples' bungalows. Nearly all the people go on holiday as a family. People feel we are a fairly close neighbourhood and most parents{(90%)} make sure there is a person at home when their children come in from school. Nearly all the people do not have lodgers nor do many people visit here. We are very friendly with our neighbours and we get on well. Most of us are content with our living accomodation. Most people read and watch T.V. We are not much behind in home technology, if we can afford it.
